title: Latvian election chief: voting will be more convenient in 2026
summary_full: The head of the Central Election Commission (CVK), Māris Zviedris, has promised that this year's parliamentary elections, which will take place in October, will run smoothly and that the mistakes that cost the job of his predecessor will not repeated, reports LSM's Latvian-language service in an interview.
